name: Its the apocalypse outside, & I just tossed on a poncho, & stood in the downpour so I could start my smoker for 20 lbs of pork.

content.html: Its the apocalypse outside, & I just tossed on a poncho, & stood in the downpour so I could start my smoker for 20 lbs of pork.
